title: The Bath (Le bain)
credit_line: Acquired through the generosity of Mrs. Alan M. Scaife
provenance_text:
Hilaire-Germain-Edgar Degas [1834-1917], France, until 1917; Atelier Degas, Paris, France, after 1917; (sold at Galerie Georges Petit, Paris, France, May 6, 1918 until May 8, 1918, no. 39, illustrated) [1]; purchased by Ambroise Vollard, Paris, France [2]. Purchased by Sam Salz, Inc., New York, NY, May 6, 1940?, stock no. 11301 [3]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1962. 
NOTES: [1] This was the first sale of Atelier Degas. [2] possibly in shares with Durand-Ruel, Paris for 10,100 francs. [3] This work was possibly purchased on May 6, 1940.
